item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Hours series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in New Haven.

This week's location is: Mory’s

Who gets you into exclusive places? The collective does! That’s right - this week we’re going to head over to Mory’s, a private membership-only Yale icon. It was originally opened in 1849 (as of 2005 it was named an official New Haven landmark), but it has been newly renovated in the last year. The new Temple Bar in the back, where we’ll be, is  beautiful. We had a great time last time we went, so let's go again.  They’re offering some great specials for us:

• $4 Martini Specials

• $3 Wine Specials

• $2 Beer Specials

• Bar snacks/popcorn/chips & salsa

More info on Mory’s

Official Mory’s Website

Hope to see you all there. Host is Devorah, contact number in RSVP.

Please RSVP to give the proprietors an accurate estimate of how many people.  If you are only a "Maybe" for Happy Hour events please put this in your RSVP Comment.

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...

Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours. Ever.

***Bring a friend***
item.name: **Happy Hour at the exclusive Mory's!**
